short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refresh the aplication on click on start button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension refresh the browser on the click of start button and stops on the click of stop button user can modify after how many seconds or millisecond he wants to refresh the browser for this user firstly have to signup and and then login than he has to subscribe after this he is able to perform the functionality he can also logout whenever he wants.
